description: Offer Copient JSON Schema. Author: Daniel Cheung Date: 4/30/2020. Modified on 6/12/2020 by Alex Nunes. Reason: move notification group to Offer section.

DeployInd.description: If this field is true, then offer will be marked for deployment to the store as part of the request. If this field is false, then offer will not be marked for deployment to the store as part of the request.

DeferDeployInd.description: If this field is true, if (offer ⇾ deploy) is true, then deployment will be deferred. If this field is false, offer will not be deferred deployed.

EngineTypeNm.description: Type of Engine that generated the offer.

LastUpdateTs.description: Date and time stamp of the last time the offer was modified.

OfferExternaId.description: External Offer Id. Ex: Offers from TOGM, OMS and EMOM.

CategoryDsc.description: Category of the offer. This must match an existing category defined in Logix (ex. 007-J4U Manufacturer Coupons.

VendorCouponCd.description: Not used functionally in the Offer delivery, mainly for reporting after the fact.

PriorityNm.description: The name of the priority (ex. High, Medium, JPriority1, ...). this field must already be defined in Logix.

FooterPriorityMsgTxt.description: Only used when the priority is set to Footer Printed Message. This field will define within a footer printed message (i.e. Scorecard offer) the ordering of the receipt print on the customer receipt.

TestingStartDt.description: Start date for testing. Testing dates are where the offer is active ONLY for testing locations.

TestingEndDt.description: Etart date for testing. Testing dates are where the offer is active ONLY for testing locations.

EligibilityStartDt.description: Start date for eligibility. Eligibility dates define when notifications (offer ⇾ notifications]) can be given to the customer

EligibilityEndDt.description: End date for eligibility. Eligibility dates define when notifications (offer ⇾ notifications]) can be given to the customer

ProductionStartDt.description: Start date for production. Active offers will be given to the customer during the production dates

ProductionEndDt.description: End date for production. Active offers will be given to the customer during the production dates

LimitNbr.description: Number of times eligibility is awarded.

PeriodQty.description: The quantity of period the eligibility is to be distributed.

QuantityType.description: The quantity type of period the eligibility is to be distributed.

LimitNbr.description: Number of times reward is awarded.

PeriodQty.description: The quantity of period the reward is to be distributed.

QuantityType.description: The quantity type of period the reward is to be distributed

CreationSourceNm.description: The source that created the offer (ex. Logix, couponsInc). The source must already exist in Logix.

OutboundSourceNm.description: The outbound source. The source must already exist in Logix.

ChargebackVendorId.description: The chargeback vendor (used to reconcile redemptions). The chargeback vendor must already exist in Logix.

EmployeeEligibilityTypNm.description: None - No employee filtering, available to everyone.Employees Only - Only employees are eligibleEmployees Excluded - Only non-employees are eligible

EosDeferInd.description: True - Offer rewards are calculated and delivered at End Of Sale. False - Offer rewards are calculated and delivered at Total

ImpressionInd.description: True - Offer will generate impressions. False - Offer will not generate impressions

RedemptionInd.description: True - Offer will generate redemption history records for redemptions. False - Offer will not generate redemption history records for redemptions

IssuanceInd.description: True - Offer will generate issuance records when redeemed. False - Offer will not generate issuance records when redeemed

ManufacturerCouponInd.description: True - Offer discounts will be treated as manufacturer coupon (payment). False - Offer will not be treated as manufacturer couponManufacturer coupons will behave differently than non-manufacturer coupon when it comes to net of discounts as well as chargeback

TierQty.description: The specific quantities required for each tier If enginetype = CPE Instant Win, then tiers array count cannot be more than 1.

ProgramNm.description: The name of the required stored value program. Stored value program must already exist in Logix

TenderNm.description: the specific tender name (ex. MasterCard) required tender name must already exist in Logix.

ExcludedAmt.description: If this tender condition is exclusion, then this will be the amount required to be excluded.

TenderAmt.description: The amount of tender required for the tier amounts must be ascending for each subsequent tier

StartTm.description: Start time of the offer. Format: HH:MM:SSformat is in 24 hour time.

EndTm.description: End time of the offer. Format: HH:MM:SSformat is in 24 hour time.

DisplayCashierMessageifUnusedInd.description: true - trigger code was scanned but the offer was not redeemed, show cashier message. false - trigger code was scanned but the offer was not redeemed, do not show cashier message

RequirementDsc.description: Once Per Transaction - Customer only needs to scan the trigger code once to get discount on every product eligible. Once Per Redemption - Customer needs to scan a separate trigger code for each product eligible to get discount.

CustomerGroupNm: Name of the customer group that's eligible for the offer. The customer group must already exist in Logix.

CustomerGroupNm.description: Name of the customer group that is NOT eligible for the offer. The customer group must already exist in Logix.

IncProductGroupNm.description: Name of the product group. The product group must already exist in Logix. Customers must buy the products that are defined in the product group

ExcProductGroupNm.description: Name of the product group. The product group must already exist in Logix. Customers will not be eligible if they purchase products from this group

ProductComboConditionOper.description: When there are multiple product group conditions, the product combo determines if the requirement is: Customer must satisfy ALL product group conditions. Customer must satisfy at least ONE product group condition.

AmountType.description: Items - Customer must purchase X itemsDollars - Customer must purchase X dollarsWeight/Volume - Customer must purchase X kg / galQty 1 At Price - Customer must buy 1 item at $X

UniqueProductInd.description: true - Customer must buy x unique items from the product group. false - Customer can buy x number of items from the product group

MinPurchaseAmt.description: Smallest purchase amount required for the product group.

MinAmt.description: The minimum amount for the offer to start accumulating purchase amounts.

LimitNbr.description: The limit on how much the offer can accumulate on the product group.

PeriodDayNbr.description: The time (number of days) limit on how much the offer can accumulate on the product group.

ProductAmt.description: The amount of product required for the offer. Amounts must be ascending for subsequent tiers.

DisqualifierProductGroupNm.description: The product group where items are disqualified. Product group must already exist in Logix.

ProgramNm.description: The points program name that is required. Points program must already exist in Logix.

PointQty.description: The specific quantities of points required per tier. If enginetype = CPE Instant Win, then tiers array count cannot be more than 1

MondayInd.description: The offer is active on Mondays.

TuesdayInd.description: The offer is active on Tuedays.

WednesdayInd.description: The offer is active on Wednesdays.

ThursdayInd.description: The offer is active on Thrusdays.

FridayInd.description: The offer is active on Fridays.

SaturdayInd.description: The offer is active on Saturdays.

SundayInd.description: The offer is active on Sundays.

AttributeNm.description: The name of the attribute. Attribute must already exist in Logix.

AttributeComboOper.description: And - when there are multiple attribute conditions, ALL must be satisfied. Or - when there are multiple attribute conditions, AT LEAST ONE must be satisfied

AttributeVal.description: The value of the attribute. The attribute value must already exist in logix.

AardTypeNm.description: The name of the card type.

PrizeFrequencyNbr.description: Per Offer - When the number of prizes for Per Offer

DiscountType.description: Item Level - item level discountDepartment Level - department level discountBasket Level - basket / department (set chargeback) level discount

DepartmentNm.description: name of the chargeback department (i.e. General Merchandise) chargeback department must already exist in Logix.

DepartmentId.description: Defines a code that uniquely identifies the departments based on its function. Chargeback department (i.e. 301) chargeback department must already exist in Logix.

DistributionType.description: Fixed Amount Off - Cents off discountPrice Point (Items) - Price point on single itemPercent Off - Percent discountStored Value - Stored value discount (stored value have dollar value)Free - Free ItemFixed Amount Off (Weight/Volume) - Fixed discount per Kg / galPrice Point (Weight/Volume) - Price point per kg / galSpecial Pricing - Price Point - Sequence of price points per each discounted item.

TierItemLimitNbr.description: Maximum items that can be discounted

TierMaxDollarItemLimitAmt.description: Maximum dollars that can be discounted from the item.

TierReceiptTxt.description: The display text on the receipt for the discount line item.

DiscountAmountTypelevel2.description: Only for percent off discounts. The discount type once level1 limit has been reached

TierLevel2Amt.description: Used only for percent off discounts. The amount of level 2 discount.

PercentOffLimitLevel2Amt.description: Used only for percent off discounts. The limit if level 2 discount is also percent off discount

Amountlevel3.description: Used only for percent off discounts. The discount type for level 3 discounts.

maxWeightLimitVal.description: The maximum weight or volume that can be discounted.

weightLimitType.description: Total - the weight volume limit applies to total weight / volume that is discounted by this offerPer Item - the limit applies on a per item basis

RestartPointInd.description: True - special pricing starts with this particular price. False - special pricing does not start with this particular price

StoredValueProgramNm.description: Used for stored value discounts. The stored value program to discount. Stored value program must already exist in Logix.

ScorecardEnableInd.description: True discount scorecard is enabled. False discount is not displayed on scorecard.

ScorecardNm.description: The scorecard name to display line item onscorecard must already exist in Logix.

ScorecardLineTxt.description: The line item for the discount scorecard.

ComputeDiscountInd.description: Affects for weight/volume discounts. True - CPE will calculate the total discount by taking amount x weight or volume. False - CPE will not calculate the total discount and only send the price per volume to POS

BestdealInd.description: True - will evaluate all other best deal offers on the same item and only give the one that gives the highest discount. False - will process as incremental discount

AllowNegativeInd.description: True - discount will be given even if the amount is greater than the item's price. False - discount will not give the discount if the amount is greater than the item's price

FlexNegativeInd.description: True - if the discount is more than the item price, CPE will flex it so the item's net price is $0. False - the CPE will not flex the discount if it is more than the item price.

PrintedMessageTxt.description: Defines the printed message for each tear earned. If enginetype = CPE Instant Win, then tiers array count cannot be more than 1

ConsumerGroupNm.description: The list of customer groups to add the customer to, depending on earned tier. If enginetype = CPE Instant Win, then tiers array count cannot be more than 1.

ProgramNm.description: The points program to award the customer with. The points program must already exist in logix.

ChargebackDepartmentCd.description: The department to chargeback the earned points to. The department must already exist in logix.

pointMaxAdjustmentInd.description: True - there is a maximum adjustment for rewarded points. False - there will not be any maximum adjustment for rewarded points

maxPointAllowNbr.description: Maximum number of points that can be awarded to the customer this transaction.

ScorecardEnableInd.description: True - rewarded points will print on scorecard. False - rewarded points will not print on scorecard

ProgramNm.description: Points program to add points to. Points program must already exist in Logix

TierPointNbr.description: Number of points to reward for the given tier. Numbers must be ascending for each sequential tier

DisplayImmediatelyInd.description: True - cashier message will display as soon as customer qualifies for it. False - cashier message will display at end of sale if the customer qualifies for it.

BeepType.description: Do Not Beep - cashier message will not beepBeep Once - cashier message will beep onceBeep Until Cleared - cashier message will keep beeping until checker presses CLEARBeep For Duration (Seconds) - cashier message will beep for XX seconds

BeepDurationSec.description: Only used for beep type = Beep For Duration (Seconds)will beep for this many seconds.

FrankedMessageTxt.description: Franked text to display on the printer.

FrankInd.description: Determines whether or not both the POS data and franking message should be franked on the printer.

OpencashDrawerInd.description: True - the cash drawer will open. False - the cash drawer will remain closed.

MessagerOverrideInd.description: True - manager override code will be required to frank. False - manager override code will not be required to frank.

displayImmediatelyInd.description: True - cashier message will display as soon as customer qualifies for it. False - cashier message will display at end of sale if the customer qualifies for it.

BeepType.description: Do Not Beep - cashier message will not beepBeep Once - cashier message will beep onceBeep Until Cleared - cashier message will keep beeping until checker presses CLEARBeep For Duration (Seconds) - cashier message will beep for XX seconds.

BeepDurationSec.description: Only used for beep type = Beep For Duration (Seconds)will beep for this many seconds.

ProgramNm.description: Stored value program name. Stored value program must already exist in Logix.

StoredValueNbr.description: The number of stored values to award to the customer. The amounts must be ascending for each sequential tier.

ScorecardEnableInd.description: True - stored value awarded will show up on scorecard. False - stored value awarded will not show up on scorecard.

ScorecardNm.description: Name of the scorecard to displayscorecard must already exist in Logix.

ScorecardTxt.description: Text to show on the scorecard.

notifications.description: Notifications are given to the customer when only the customer condition is satisfied.

PrintedMessageTxt.description: Printed message to be shown on receipt.

Beeptype.description: Do Not Beep - cashier message will not beepBeep Once - cashier message will beep onceBeep Until Cleared - cashier message will keep beeping until checker presses CLEARBeep For Duration (Seconds) - cashier message will beep for XX seconds.

BeepDurationSec.desription: Only used for beep type = Beep For Duration (Seconds)will beep for this many seconds.

DisplayImmediatelyInd.description: True - cashier message will display as soon as customer is eligible. False - cashier message will display at end of sale if customer is eligible

AcumulationPrintedMessageInd.description: Accumulation message text to print on bottom of the receipt.

items.description: Name of the store group to deploystore group must already exist in Logix.

TerminalNm.description: Terminal name where offer is active. Terminal name must already exist in logix.
Terminal name where the offer is not active in (excluded). Terminal name must already exist in Logix.

ProductGroupNm.description: The name of the product group as defined in Logix UI

ProductGroupDsc.description: The description of the product group as defined in Logix UI

LastUpdateTs.description: Date and time stamp of the last time the offer was modified.

ExtProductId.description: The identifier for each product, it can be any of the following Items (UPC), Departments, Mix Match, Manufacturer Family Code, Pool Code.

ProductTypeNm.description: The type of the identifier for the above product.

ProductDsc.description: The description of the item itself.

StoreGroupNm.description: The name of the store group as defined in Logix UI.

LastUpdateTs.description: Date and time stamp of the last time the offer was modified.

ExtLocationCd.description: The identifier for each store as defined in Safeway, right now, the format is of qDDSSSS, where D is division number, S is store number.

StoreNm.description: The name of the store as defined in Logix UI, this is typically the same as above extlocationcode.

StoreDsc.description: The description of the store as defined in Logix UI.

StoreTestingInd.description: This is an indicator to the Logix application that if this is a lab or a production store.

CityNm.description: The city where the store is in.

StateCd.description: The state where the store is in.

PostalCd.description: The postal code where the store is in.

CountryNm.description: The country where the store is in.
